item.description:
Singles Dance – like no other!!!!!

Friday, October 7, 2011, 8:00 PM   

 lafayette Club

18 Lakeview Avenue, Taunton 02570, MA (map)

Price: $7.00/per person

 

This MEETUP is for those of you who like to dance !...Roger Leary has had many requests to host a dance for people of our age group so we can hear the music we like without it starting too late, being so loud your teeth chatter, or so we don't have to compete for floor space with patrons young enough to be our children.

So this is our first installment in the MEETUP DANCE SERIES !!!!.... We will be posting it in a many different groups so make sure you tell your friends. The more the merrier!!!. If this does well Roger will organize more at different venues and possibly with bands too
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a meet-up sign on the table
item.name: Have a blast at a Meet-Up Dance!
